meanings.sent1: She looked around dazedly after waking up from a nap.
meanings.sent2: The man stumbled dazedly out of the dark room.
meanings.sent3: The puppy blinked dazedly at its reflection in the mirror.
meanings.sent4: The student stared dazedly at the complex math problem on the board.
meanings.sent5: The lights flickered, and she gazed dazedly at the sudden darkness.

meanings.sent1: The dazedly expression on her face revealed her confusion.
meanings.sent2: He walked through the maze dazedly, unsure of the correct path.
meanings.sent3: The cat sat dazedly in the middle of the room, unsure where to go next.
meanings.sent4: The city streets seemed dazedly crowded during rush hour.
meanings.sent5: The lost hiker gazed dazedly at the unfamiliar surroundings.
